algorithm_technique: Iterate through the word, checking length, character types (alphanumeric), and presence of vowels and consonants.
problem_summary_simple: Check if a word meets specific criteria: length, characters, vowels, and consonants.
problem_summary_technical: Validate word length (>=3), ensure all characters are alphanumeric, and confirm the presence of at least one vowel and one consonant.
key_insights: The problem requires checking multiple conditions sequentially. Early exit is possible if any condition fails.
Character validation involves checking if a character is a letter or a digit. Any other character makes the word invalid.
Tracking the presence of vowels and consonants requires iterating through the word and using flags.
